enchantment.elytra_enchants.skipping.des: Bounces when landing with a jump
enchantment.minecraft.aqua_affinity.desc: Increases the mining speed while underwater
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Reduces the damage from explosions and explosion knockback
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: Summons a lightning bolt on hit during a thunderstorm
enchantment.minecraft.density.desc: Increases the damage based on the fall impact
enchantment.minecraft.depth_strider.desc: Increases the movement speed while underwater
enchantment.minecraft.feather_falling.de: Reduces the fall damage and teleportation damage
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces the effects of fire damage and the burn time
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.desc: Gives a chance for additional item drops
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Gives a better chance of catching valuables
enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc: Reduces the damage from most sources
enchantment.minecraft.punch.desc: Increases the knockback strength of arrows
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: Launches the carrier forward while raining
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.desc: Allows fragile blocks to be collected
enchantment.minecraft.soul_fire_aspect.d: Inflicts soul fire damage on attack
enchantment.minecraft.soul_flame.desc: Inflicts soul fire damage on hit
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: Increases the movement speed on soul blocks
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping_edge.desc: Increases the damage of sweeping attacks
enchantment.minecraft.swift_sneak.desc: Increases the movement speed while sneaking
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Returns the damage to the attacker
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: Loses durability at a slower rate
enchantment.minecraft.wind_burst.desc: Launches the carrier on smash attacks
enchantment.nova_structures.conductivity: Gives a chance to get struck by lightning during a thunderstorm
enchantment.nova_structures.gravity.desc: Fires a gravitational pull that draws towards the impact
enchantment.nova_structures.photosynthes: Repairs itself when is in direct view of the sun
enchantment.nova_structures.traveler.des: Increases the movement speed and lets step up blocks
enchantment.nova_structures.wax_wings.de: Negates durability loss while gliding slowly but raises it while gliding quickly
enchantment.nova_structures.wither_coate: Inflicts wither damage on attack at the cost of higher durability loss
